<Text: Ball-bearing Run was the nickname of a war-time flight "Stockholmsruten" between Stockholm and Leuchers, Scotland.>
Triplets:<Ball-bearing Run
1:
--------------------
Text: Ball-bearing Run:  The flight was run by the Royal Norwegian Air Force, but for political reasons operated as an ordinary BOAC Flight, aircraft having civilian registration and the Norwegian military crew wearing BOAC uniforms and British passports.
Triplets:<The flight
